nodes.text: This lightsaber was built by Dooku, future leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Sith Lord, during his time as a Jedi Padawan. At some point after becoming a Jedi Knight, Dooku set aside his first weapon and built a new and superior lightsaber with a personalized design that he used throughout his years as both a Jedi Master and Sith.
Dooku's first lightsaber was first mentioned in the 2015 reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know.

The sources are inconsistent regarding when Dooku set aside this lightsaber in favor of building a new one that he used for the rest of his life. While both Absolutely Everything You Need to Know and its updated edition state that he used his second lightsaber as a Jedi Knight, Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition states that he built it as a Jedi Master.
